import { Meta, Story } from "@storybook/addon-docs/blocks";
import DisplayBox from "./DisplayBox.vue";

<Meta title="DisplayBox" component={DisplayBox} />

# Display Box

The display box is used to highlight or group together information with an optional icon.

## API

| Prop    | Type           | Required | Description                                               | Default |
| ------- | -------------- | -------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| styling | string         | false    | css classnames representing the styling you wish to apply | ""      |
| icon    | element        | false    | jsx element representing the icon                         | null    |
| element | string/element | true     | display element jsx for the content of the display box    |         |

<br />

## Display Box (Without Icon)

Used for content with no icon. In this case, rendering a table within the display box.

<Story name="Without Icon" id="displaybox--without-icon"></Story>

```bash
const elements = [
  { name: "BCeID", value: "bobross42" },
  {
    name: "Last Name",
    value: "Ross"
  },
  { name: "First Name", value: "Bob" },
  { name: "Email Address", value: "bob.ross@example.com" }
];

const table = <Table v-bind:elements="elements" />;

<DisplayBox v-bind:element="table" />;
```

## Display Box (With Icon)

Used for content with an icon.

<Story name="With Icon" id="displaybox--with-icon"></Story>

```bash
import Icon from "Icon.vue";

<DisplayBox :icon="Icon" v-bind:element="table" />;
```

## Display Box (With Blue Background)

Used for content with a gov-themed blue background.

<Story
  name="With Blue Background"
  id="displaybox--with-blue-background"
></Story>

```bash
import Icon from "Icon.vue";

<DisplayBox :icon="Icon" v-bind:element="table" styling="bcgov-blue-background" />;
```

## Display Box (With Border)

Used for content with a border around it.

<Story
  name="With Border"
  id="displaybox--with-border"
></Story>

```bash
import Icon from "Icon.vue";

<DisplayBox :icon="Icon" v-bind:element="table" styling="bcgov-border-background" />;
```
